name: The Answer is Always 20
description:
A puzzle game where the answer always has something to do with 20 (e.g. 20 in binary, doing something 20 times or doing something for 20 seconds.).

CONTROLS

Mouse: Click on objects to interact and on empty space to move the character.

PREMISE

        The answer is 20. It always has been 20.

        As the year 2020 approaches, the Institute becomes more desperate to find out why. Kidnapping the greatest minds of the world and performing unethical experiments in secret facilities, no means are too extreme to reach their goal of fully understanding the significance of 20.  It is in one such facility where our protagonist finds himself as the game begins.

        Now he must escape... or discover the mystery surrounding the number 20.

Made for GameMaker 20 Jam #GM20 in collaboration with Adobo Pasta Games.

Made with GameMaker Studio 2.
